entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a person who has a forehead that can be seen by others.

entities.name: professor karkaroff
entities.description: Professor Karkaroff is the headmaster of Durmstrang and is described as having a fearful reaction to seeing Mad-Eye Moody.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is standing in the doorway, leaning on his staff, with his magical eye glaring at Professor Karkaroff.

entities.name: the boy with food all down his front
entities.description: A boy who has food all over his front is nudging the girl next to him and pointing at Harry's forehead.

entities.name: the girl next to him
entities.description: The girl next to the boy with food all down his front is being pointed at by the boy.

relationships.description: Mad-Eye Moody confronts Professor Karkaroff, causing a fearful reaction from the latter.
Mad-Eye Moody is standing near Harry Potter in the doorway.
